CustomField.formula: IF(OperatingCompany__c = 'Plantyn', IF($Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId, CASE(ShippingCostMethodNsId__c, '193','Based on order total', '194','Based on weight Domestic', '195','Based on weight non Domestic', '196','Shipping Cost Exempt', '' ), CASE(ShippingCostMethodNsId__c, '193','Based on order total', '194','Based on weight Domestic', '195','Based on weight non Domestic', '196','Shipping Cost Exempt', '' )), IF (OperatingCompany__c = 'Noordhoff', IF($Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId, CASE(ShippingCostMethodNsId__c , '7521','Based on order total', '7522','Based on weight Domestic', '7523','Based on weight non Domestic', '7524','Shipping Cost Exempt', '' ), CASE(ShippingCostMethodNsId__c , '36406','Based on order total', '36407','Based on weight Domestic', '36408','Based on weight non Domestic', '20760','Shipping Cost Exempt', '' )), IF (OperatingCompany__c = 'Liber', CASE(ShippingCostMethodNsId__c, '0','Based on order total', '0','Based on weight Domestic', '0','Based on weight non Domestic', '0','Shipping Cost Exempt', '' ), '' ) ) )
CustomField.label: Shipping Cost from NSId
